p: The result of the IC 50 value of samples from DPPH scavenging assay against the DPPH free radical and NO scavenging assay against the nitric oxide free radical is in Table 2. Ascorbic acid had shown a good IC 50 value of 9.99 µg/ml against DPPH free radical, but curcumin had exhibited an IC 50 value of 0.12 µg/ml towards nitric oxide free radical. However, both the extracts of plant samples had shown IC 50 value nearly similar to that of standard as ascorbic acid and curcumin which is shown in Table 2.
